item.title: About
item.description: âœ‹ Hiï¼ŒI am Huang Zifeng Hi, I am a student majoring in Automation from Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen. I am proficient in simple STM32 development and I enjoy photography ğŸ“·, playing games ğŸ®, and occasionally tinkering with deep learning and blogging. My goal is to become a Full Stack DevOps and I am currently working hard to achieve that. Follow me on GitHub to learn more about me.
item.content:encoded:
âœ‹ Hiï¼ŒI am Huang Zifeng

Hi, I am a student majoring in Automation from Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen. I am proficient in simple STM32 development and I enjoy photography ğŸ“·, playing games ğŸ®, and occasionally tinkering with deep learning and blogging. My goal is to become a Full Stack DevOps and I am currently working hard to achieve that. Follow me on GitHub to learn more about me.

item.title: Writing a English Post
item.description: I want to, and will, write something in English, not just copying the post in Chinese to the English folder, with time permitted.
item.content:encoded:
I want to, and will, write something in English,

not just copying the post in Chinese to the English folder,

with time permitted.
